alert.note: Alert for Elmore; Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 05 at 11:27AM CST until February 08 at 5:30AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Tallapoosa River At The Tallapoosa Water Plant affecting Elmore and Montgomery Counties. .Minor flooding is forecast on the Tallapoosa River Basin and a flood warning remains in effect at the Tallapoosa Water Plant. Another statement will be issued by this evening, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tallapoosa River At The Tallapoosa Water Plant. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Lower Wetumpka Road starts to flood. Extensive flooding of low lands occurs and livestock and farm equipment should be moved to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM CST Saturday the stage was 24.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 29.4 feet Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
